title: Unilever’s Magnum Ice Cream Co. Trades at €7.9 Billion Value
description: Unilever Plc’s spinoff The Magnum Ice Cream Co. was valued lower than some analysts expected in its debut on Monday, as the world’s biggest ice cream company looks to revive its performance as a standalone firm.
